Package characters.Entities.abilities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAbility<THost extends Entity,TTarget extends Entity>
    the ability can be host by player and enemy
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbilityBase<THost extends Entity,TTarget extends Entity>  
    AbilityFactory
    the factory to create different abilities
    AttackPlayerAbility
    Create ability to make damage to player.
    GhostModeAbility
    Create ability to let enemy become invisible
    GlobalSlowDownAbility
    Create ability for player which is used to slow down npc and enemies.
    HigherSystemDamageAbility
    Create ability to damage system with higher damage.
    InactiveAbility
    This is an ability instance, that does nothing Used for when an infiltrator is arrested, and the ability should be removed
    MarkInfiltratorAbility
    Create ability for player which is used to mark one of the closest enemies.
    ReinforcedSystemsAbility
    Create ability for player which is used to keep the system from being damaged.
    SlowDownTargetAbility
    Create ability to slow down player's speed.
    SpeedingUpAbility
    Create ability to increase speed for enemy.
    StopTargetAbility
    Create ability to stop player moving.
